name: Rowarrange
tagline: This is a logical, brain storming & score based game..
body:
### Welcome to Rowarrange 
Rowarrange is logical score based, browser based game. It's mainly written in javascript. 



### How to play
Swipe [ Up, Left, Right, Down ] the boxes and arrange in alphabetical order i.e a b c d. It's purely score based game.

### Instructions 
**Task** : is to move [ swipe ] the boxes and arrange them in "a b c d" order

**Play** : swipe your finger [ left, right, up or down ] to move the box. After assigned time interval new row will appear at the top and all others will shift down by one row.

**Points** : earned when row with "a b c d" gets vanish, points will increase by 4. if new row comes in order "a b c d" it vanishes automatically and points are given as lucky bonus

**Speed** : time interval is 22 seconds for slow, 14 seconds for medium and 5 seconds for fast.

**Game Over** : game is over when all boxes reach to the bottom

### Authors and Contributors
This game is created by Sachin Jadhav @sachie026.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
